question: How many times ‘President Rule’ has been imposed in Madhya Pradesh?
explanation:
First in M.P from 29 April 1977 to 25 June 1977 57 when Government dismissed in spite of Shyama Charan Shukla enjoying majority support in Assembly.
Second in M.P from18 February 1980 to 8 June 1980 111 when Government dismissed in spite of Mr. Sundar Lal Patwa enjoying majority support in Assembly
Third in M.P from 15 December 1992 to 7 December 1993 357 Government dismissed in the aftermath of Babri Masjid-Ram Janmasthan destruction in Uttar Pradesh.
